subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: An elbow injury to Víctor Martínez all but ended the Indians’ flickering playoff hopes, and will probably lead to a trade of the ace left-hander C. C. Sabathia.
snippet: An elbow injury to Víctor Martínez all but ended the Indians’ flickering playoff hopes, and will probably lead to a trade of the ace left-hander C. C. Sabathia.
